SELECT A.CAFE_NM, A.CAFE_THEME_NM, A.THEME_TIME, (SELECT LGRP_NM FROM CMP_CODE_MAPPING WHERE SGRP_CD = 'THEME_CATEGORY' AND LGRP_CD = A.THEME_GENRE) AS THEME_GENRE, (CASE WHEN A.THEME_DIFF = 1 THEN '★☆☆☆☆' WHEN A.THEME_DIFF = 2 THEN '★★☆☆☆' WHEN A.THEME_DIFF = 3 THEN '★★★☆☆' WHEN A.THEME_DIFF = 4 THEN '★★★★☆' ELSE '★★★★★' END) AS THEME_DIFF , (SELECT LGRP_NM FROM CMP_CODE_MAPPING WHERE SGRP_CD = 'THEME_ACTIVITY' AND LGRP_CD = A.THEME_ACT) AS THEME_ACT, B.URL AS CAFE_LINK FROM CAFE_THEME A INNER JOIN CAFE_CATEGORY B ON A.CAFE_CD = B.CAFE_CD WHERE 1=1
AND ( REPLACE(A.CAFE_NM, ' ', '') LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR REPLACE(A.CAFE_THEME_NM,' ','') LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%')
AND A.THEME_PEO_TWO = 'T'
AND A.THEME_PEO_TRHEE = 'T'
AND A.THEME_PEO_FOUR = 'T'
AND A.THEME_PEO_FIVE = 'T'
AND B.SGG_CD IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_GENRE IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_CATE IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_DIFF IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_ACT IN
#{item}
ORDER BY CAFE_NM, CAFE_THEME_NM OFFSET #{pageIndex} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

AND ( REPLACE(A.CAFE_NM, ' ', '') LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%' OR REPLACE(A.CAFE_THEME_NM,' ','') LIKE '%' || #{keyWord} || '%')
AND A.THEME_PEO_TWO = 'T'
AND A.THEME_PEO_TRHEE = 'T'
AND A.THEME_PEO_FOUR = 'T'
AND A.THEME_PEO_FIVE = 'T'
AND B.SGG_CD IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_GENRE IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_CATE IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_DIFF IN
#{item}
AND A.THEME_ACT IN
#{item}
ORDER BY CAFE_NM, CAFE_THEME_NM )
